# Sowy, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Sowy  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Janowiec Kościelny, within Nidzica County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south of Janowiec Kościelny,  south-east of Nidzica, and  south of the regional capital Olsztyn.
